screen_desc: The screenshot shows the login page for eBay on a mobile browser. Users can sign in with their email or username, or use alternative social media accounts like Facebook, Google, or Apple for a faster sign-in process. There is an option to stay signed in for convenience but it warns that this might not be secure on shared devices.
